name: Heat of Battle
entries: Starting at 3rd level you feel the heat of battle burn through you while in a fight. As your Heat of Battle builds, you gain access to compounding bonus effects as shown in the table below.

items: Taking fire damage once per round
Marking an additional weapon attack after the first once on your turn

entries: At the start of each of your turns your Heat of Battle increases by 1. Additionally, your Heat of Battle increases by 1 under the following conditions:

entries.caption: Heat of Battle Effects
rows: You begin to shed bright light for 10 feet, and dim light for an additional 10 feet
You deal an extra 2 fire damage once per turn when you hit with a weapon attack
You begin to cauterize your own wounds. You gain advantage on death saving throws
Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20

entries: If your Heat of Battle falls below the threshold of an effect, you lose that effect until you cross the threshold again. If you are not in combat, or you are knocked unconscious your Heat of Battle dissipates at a rate of two points per round at the end of your turn. At no point can your Heat of Battle be below 0.
